name: Music Tiles - Piano, Guitar, Drum and Dubstep Songs

description:

◈◈12+ Instrument!!! ◈◈
◈◈50+ Celebrity Theme!!! ◈◈
◈◈Most smooth White Tiles Game!!!◈◈
◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈◈

"Music Tiles" is the newest upgrade version of "Don't Tap The White Tile" in 2014 June.

We give you 6 reasons to upgrade to this newest version:
◈ Besides Piano, we support Guitar, Drum and Dubstep!
◈ 30+ Coolest music embedded and will expend in future upgrade!
◈ Support use your own music in iPod Library!
◈ Support user selected single song loop!
◈ Most smooth tap experience ever on AppStore!
◈ Real Zen Mode - no time limited!
◈ 20 Color Theme!


It's a brand new game which has so many new features. Check it out!
We will keep improving our game,more features are coming soon!

Watch your step, DON'T TOUCH ANY WHITE TILE. This is the core rule in this additive game.

Is it easy? Everyone can handle it, but not everyone can handle it well. What about you?

【Game Features】:
◈ 15 Awesome Game Modes
◈ Easy to play for all ages.
◈ Better User Interface
◈ Beautiful Instrument Sound And Classic Sound.
◈ Flexible configuration before every time game.
◈ Rest reminder configuration
◈ Tile movement configuration
◈ Game Center Support
◈ Social Share Support

We hope you will like it!
Enjoy yourself !!
